title: Andrew Jackson cartoon - sourcing and situation

content.question: 1. Using the image ,answer (a), (b), and (c). Briefly describe ONE perspective about politics in the 1830s expressed in the image. Briefly explain ONE specific event or development that led to the perspective expressed in the image. Briefly explain ONE specific effect of the political developments referenced by the image.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
